content.query:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DimJobSalaries](

[SalariesKey] [int] NOT NULL,

[work_year] [int] NULL,

[experience_level] [nvarchar](15) NULL,

[employment_type] [nvarchar](15) NULL,

[job_title] [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL,

[salary] [int] NULL,

[salary_currency] [nvarchar](15) NULL,

[salary_in_usd] [int] NULL,

[employee_residence] [nvarchar](15) NULL,

[remote_ratio] [int] NULL,

[company_location] [nvarchar](15) NULL,

[company_size] [nvarchar](15) NULL

)

WITH
(
DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,

CLUSTERED INDEX (SalariesKey)
);

GO
